name: Toro Magno
brand: Smoking Jacket Cigars (by Hendrik Kelner Jr.)
additionalNotes:
The Toro Magno and Robusto Imperial shares a Brazilian Cubra leaf, which Kelner describes as “beautiful, with great taste.”

All Vitolas shares a Dominican Binder bundles a Dominican, Nicaraguan and Peruvian Tobaccos as a filler.
These cigars shares a complete unique smoking experience with creamy smooth and flavorful medium body.
